channel.title: Lost-Dynasty | NEWELY RELEASED! | 317 | 100% UPTIME | CODED TO PLEASE YOU!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.minus.com/iNXq7zFUuMW32.gif[/img]
[b][u]About Lost-Dynasty[/u][/b] The best of the best server to hit the toplist. Lost-Dynasty is a 317 with amazing qualities to offer. We have a Perfect ECO, PKing and skilling system that makes this server unique like never before - Amazing fully working minigames, monsters & top of the line content to make you never want to join any other server. Source that has custom coded to please your needs. Amazing staff members, developers & owner that listen to you; the player to code what YOU want. This is the journey of a lifetime - On the server of a lifetime. It's time for your dynasty to unfold. Others already have. Question is: Are you ready?
Join the forums now and download the server at: http://lost-dynasty.org.
Your destiny is waiting for you to unfold it.
[IMG]http://i5.minus.com/ip8v6UaJlB3Pj.png[/img][url=http://lost-dynasty.org/client.html]Webclient[/url] [IMG]http://i5.minus.com/ip8v6UaJlB3Pj.png[/img][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/dcvc3182d5uk8ag/Lost-Dynasty.jar]Download jar client[/url] [IMG]http://i2.minus.com/iITb4U8H8BExY.png[/img][url=http://lost-dynasty.org/forums/payments.php]Donate[/url] [IMG]http://i1.minus.com/i7eWb06HHY1x0.png[/img][url=http://lost-dynasty.org/forums/showthread.php?93-Donator-Benefits&p=291#post291]Donator Benefits[/url] [IMG]http://i4.minus.com/iSGwRmvs7QfGp.png[/img][url=http://lost-dynasty.org/forums/]Forums[/url] [IMG]http://i3.minus.com/ibuPvkKiqcpxxE.png[/img][url=http://lost-dynasty.org/vote]Vote[/url]
[url=http://www.badsite.net/showthread.php?tid=4382276]$75 contest!+ || [Runescape Private Server] Lost-Dynasty Win free donator! Enter now![/url]
Lost Dynasty is already #1 on gamingtoplist... [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tTmHZsl.png[/img]
[u][b]Staff Team[/b][/u] Owner - Mahdy Web Security - Zayne Head Admin - Cyph convenience
[u][b]Some Media[/b][/u]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fsT9PD2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ey3La0C.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rdQ63kd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hm2zSfR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hRurnAw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xx1zTSw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WP0rR5n.png[/img]
That's enough media, now you decide why everyone is switching over to Lost-Dynasty!
[url=http://lost-dynasty.org/forums/forum.php][IMG]http://i2.minus.com/iuKt4hwmu0yeV.jpg[/img][/url]
Join us today and experience gameplay you have never seen before! Our gameplay will leave you speechless.
Join the revolution today - [url=http://lost-dynasty.org/forums/forum.php]Lost-Dynasty Forums[/url] We have advertisements placed on: Rune-server, GamingTopList and many more[/center] to come!

item.title: Lost-Dynasty | NEWELY RELEASED! | 317 | 100% UPTIME | CODED TO PLEASE YOU!
item.dc:creator: @Mahdy_LD Mahdy LD
item.description:
@Mahdy_LD wrote:

[quote=“nolan2131, post:6, topic:545753”][quote author=Mahdy LD link=topic=664637.msg4443341#msg4443341 date=1407668312]

‘Never seen before content’.

Where did you hide that…

What? Not sure what you mean. Hey man, have some respect. Please do not trash my sales thread. If you have nothing good to say, don’t.

Barrage works flawlessly!

Player count increasing! Regardless of what people say, everyone who has joined Lost-Dynasty loves it and will not join any other server because this is the one for them. The community is awesome, the game is addicting - Why not try it for yourself? You have nothing to lose.

We reached 26 people today. We are gaining more and more by the second.

We have incredibly made it to #53 on RuneLocus thanks to the help of our amazing community. The server is growing more and more everyday. It’s time for you guys to give it a shot :]
[/quote]

He’s not trashing your thread as much as making an observation. I too missed anything that I would consider to be unique.[/quote]

Your input is very much appreciated! There is a lot of stuff unique you just need to try the server out and see what those are for yourself!

We had 13 people on about 6 hours ago. It was awesome! Thank you everyone making Lost-Dynasty grow!

Read full topic
